name: Drift Simulator: Speed Cup
description:
Drift Simulator: Speed Cup is new trending car drifting game in grand prix style, this game offers you car drifting opportunity to zealous and crazy lovers of car drifting.
FEATURES
------------------------------------------
Full real HUD including revs, gear and speed.
ABS, TC and ESP simulation. You can also turn them off!
Explore a detailed open world environment.
Realistic car damage. Crash your car!
Accurate physics.
